title: Mental Wellbeing
content:
**Parameters: Stress, Emotional level**  
 Depression takes on epidemic proportions contributing with 12% of the total burden of nonfatal global disease. Overproportional high stress level and low emotional level long-term (tracked over a month) can be significant symptoms of Depression. To midentify depression and treat it at an early stage can be beneficial for mental wellbeing of humankind
